title: New skins?
body: Does anyone have any idea when the new Super Galaxy skins will be available? I thought skins were usually released 3-4 days after the patch came out, but it's almost been a full week. I'm not complaining or anything, I'm just curious. I understand why Fizz's skin was behind because his skin on the PBE was incomplete, but Kindred's and Shyvana's were fine (I believe.) I just hope they're available soon.

replies.body: they were available for an hour on patch day, but then they went off after that
Seeing as they had Taliyah out last week, they wouldn't have released the skins at the same time due to that. I would say they come out this week.
